Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.22917879]Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC=15 µM), Staphylococcus aureus CIB 85462 (MIC=15 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25992 (MIC=8 µM), Escherichia coli CIB 84492 (MIC=8 µM);Yeast:Candida albicans (MIC=31 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref:22917879] It has 88.4 ± 4.2% hemolytic activity at 128 μg/ml against rabbit red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Shows antibacterial activity against both Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria and against the fungus C. albicans. Has hemolytic activity against rabbit erythrocytes.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides from the skin of the Asian frog, Odorrana jingdongensis De novo sequencing and analysis of tandem mass spectrometry data.
Literature.Author: Liu J, Jiang J, Wu Z, Xie F.
